is this like two fonts one is supposed to put on top of each other? interesting, but it's so hard to read...   
here's the LCD font.   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/FontFamily837.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414204151/http:/www.myfonts.com/FontFamily837.html)

All the characters are contained within one font, but the above text has been layered to look more like a digital display.   
   
Making this font, for me, was more about seeing what would happen when limiting yourself to strict guidelines than it was about creating legible letterforms--rather pointless I know...
